scripts.build:react/components: chokidar "../package/react/components/src/**/*" "../package/react/components/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 300 -c "npm --prefix ../package/react/components run build && echo '✅ [react/components] build successfully'"
scripts.build:react/utils: chokidar "../package/react/utils/src/**/*" "../package/react/utils/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 300 -c "npm --prefix ../package/react/utils run build && echo '✅ [react/utils] build successfully'"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -n playground,react/components,react/utils -c green,cyan,magenta "npm run dev" "npm run build:react/components" "npm run build:react/utils"
